name: CKEditor Cloudinary Image Upload Adapter
description: I built this node library to help upload embedded rich text images from CKEditor to cloudinary on the fly.

name: SBMK
description: I have done quite a bit of work with the slack API building bots and apps that automate processes in workspaces. This Slack Block Message Kit library helps you build slack message components with some validations.

name: Tiddy
description: I got tired of telling folks to post their messages in the right channels on slack, so I built this tool that moves messages automatically based on user reactions after a little setup.

name: Kid Math
description: When I was starting out a few years ago, I built this simply arithmetic game for kids.

name: Puff-Puff
description: Puff-Puff is an improvement over the CKEditor Image upload adapter. This package enables the upload of images to a custom server.

name: Sudoku Solver
description: As part of my tinkering with Azure Serverless Functions, I built a sudoku solver using python and an algorithm I wrote.

name: CKEditor5 Code Snippet Plugin
description: This plugin helps your create a code block or snippet in your rich text.

name: Match
description: A while ago, I built this simple memory game to test my knowledge of vanilla JavaScript, HTML and CSS
